nodes.text: Dractuvian cave slugs were small tubular creatures that lived in the caves of Dractu and had a small glowing light perched atop an antenna in order to see in the gloom. Although not particularly tasty, they could be eaten, and had been on at least two occasions by Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi. They were occasionally served at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant.
